'''Daisuke''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Taurus Iracundus Chapter]], Act I: [[Rise Up, Golden Soul]].

==Profile==
<!--detailed story/lore information goes here-->
Daisuke's parents, [[Misuzu]] and [[Sugimoto]] were captured by [[Nogata]] and his gang (including the Blue Oni [[Takuya]]), but rescued by the [[Traveler]] and [[Arataki Itto]].
